backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining room, game, player, turn, and shot-event types with in‑memory maps and CRUD methods plus a health check.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module returning old actor state unchanged, serving as a no-op data migration layer.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of core frontend files including routing, pages, components, styling, and PWA setup.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind setup defining light/dark OKLCH color variables and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app with PWA manifest and icons.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, colors, start URL, and icons.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing offline caching with cache-first static assets and network-first navigation handling.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React router setup defining layout and routes for start, game, and stats pages.
frontend/src/components/game/DoubleFinis: Empty placeholder file for a double-finish confirmation modal component.
frontend/src/components/game/GameOverScr: UI component displaying winner info, turn count, and actions for stats, rematch, or new game.
frontend/src/components/game/Keypad.tsx: Interactive numeric keypad with quick score chips and optional voice input button.
Card component showing player name, remaining score, and active-player highlighting.
frontend/src/components/game/ResumeSaved: Modal prompting the user to resume or discard a saved in‑progress game, with resume and discard actions.
frontend/src/components/game/ThreeDartsE: UI for entering up to three darts with multiplier, number, and bull options, and submitting or clearing entries.
frontend/src/components/game/TurnHistory: Renders a table showing the last five turns with score, remaining points, busts, and win indicators.
frontend/src/components/game/VoiceScoreC: Modal confirming speech‑recognized score input, showing transcript and proposed score with edit or OK actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and login state handling.
Hook wrapping browser SpeechRecognition to start/stop listening and provide transcript, errors, and support detection.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining theme colors and layout for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/layouts/AppLayout.tsx: Layout component that registers a service worker and renders the header, footer, and routed content.
frontend/src/lib/checkoutSuggestions.ts: Provides curated checkout suggestions for darts based on remaining score and Double Out rules.
frontend/src/lib/gameCore.ts: Defines core game types and logic including scoring, turn application, win conditions, and game initialization.
frontend/src/lib/gamePersistence.ts: Handles saving, loading, migrating, and clearing game state in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/gameSettings.ts: Defines game settings and utilities for saving, loading, validating, and sanitizing them via localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/gameStats.ts: Computes per‑player statistics such as averages, 180s, busts, and checkout percentage from game history.
frontend/src/lib/voiceScoreParser.ts: Parses spoken English phrases into numeric dart scores using word-to-number matching and patterns.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry that sets up React root, query client, identity provider, and renders App.
frontend/src/pages/GamePage.tsx: Main game screen managing active game state, input modes, voice scoring, turn application/undo, saved-game resume, and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/StartGamePage.tsx: Start screen allowing users to configure game mode, double-out, and players, then save settings and navigate to the game.
frontend/src/pages/StatsPage.tsx: Displays statistics for the saved or active game and provides navigation back to the game or home.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme, colors, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current app architecture, implemented features, and planned functionality.
